description:
Here are some of the best driving games available on Xbox, PlayStation and PC:

• Forza Horizon 5 (Xbox, PC) - The latest installment in the popular Forza Horizon series features stunning graphics, a huge map to explore, and over 500 cars to collect and customize.

• Gran Turismo 7 (PlayStation) - This realistic racing simulator has meticulous attention to detail for true car enthusiasts. It features over 400 cars and several track locations.

• Need for Speed Heat (Multiplatform) - The latest Need for Speed game lets you race during the day or compete in illegal nighttime street races. It has a huge selection of customizable cars.

• F1 22 (Multiplatform)- The official Formula 1 racing game for the 2022 season features all the drivers, teams and tracks from the current F1 calendar.

•Assetto Corsa Competizione (Multiplatform) - A realistic GT3 racing simulator focused specifically on discipline. It features laser-scanned tracks and highly detailed car physics.

• Dirt 5 (Multiplatform)- The latest installment in the popular rally racing series features extreme conditions, stunt driving, and a huge selection of off-road vehicles to race and customize.

• Project CARS 3 (Multiplatform) - This simulation racing game features a huge selection of cars from various motorsport categories like GT, touring cars, formula and more.

Those represent some of the best and most well-received driving games available across Xbox, PlayStation and PC. They cover a range of racing styles from realistic simulations to more arcade-like experiences. However they all offer stunning graphics, huge car selections and well designed gameplay.
name: The best driving games on Xbox and PlayStation and PC
